Metadata.description: A platform to manage interactions on social networks.

LandingPage.main-description: Celebrate the success of your digital influence journey with Social Sync, a platform designed to simplify social media interaction management, boost your performance, and amplify your online presence.

everything-you-need.title: Everything You Need
everything-you-need.description: Social Sync offers content scheduling, performance analysis, brand collaboration, engagement automation, and competitor monitoring for digital influencers.

performance-analysis.title: Performance Analysis
performance-analysis.description: Advanced analytical tools to track post performance, audience engagement, and follower growth.

content-scheduling.title: Content Scheduling
content-scheduling.description: Capability to schedule posts across multiple social networks, facilitating consistency and content management.

direct-message-management.title: Direct Message Management
direct-message-management.description: Centralize messages from various social networks in one place to efficiently respond to and manage conversations with followers.

intuitive-interface.title: Intuitive Interface
intuitive-interface.description: Celebrate the joy of accomplishment with a platform designed to monitor your progress, motivate your efforts, and celebrate your successes, multiple tasks at once.

Footer.description: @ {date} Social Sync, Inc. All rights reserved

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.none: You don't have any notifications yet!
notifications.birthday-description: Happy birthday! We hope you have a fantastic day!

home.description: See how your social networks are growing and assess their success.

posts.title: Posts
posts.description: Overview of your published and scheduled posts.
posts.no-posts-lately: You haven't made any posts recently.

errors.error-content: The content of the publication must be longer than 2 characters!

general-performance.title: Performance Highlights
general-performance.description: This month's top-performing post and follower chart.

accounts-center.description: Link your social networks in a single intuitive and efficient dashboard.

email.text: Here are the statistics of this month, just how you asked!

brands.description: This exclusive space is dedicated to providing strategic partnerships and advantages between prestigious brands and renowned influencers. Through this panel, brands have the opportunity to discover and collaborate with the best influencers, thus increasing your visibility and reach in the market. Influencers, in turn, benefit from associating themselves with reputable brands, enhancing their credibility and income. Social Sync is the perfect link to create innovative and effective advertising campaigns, ensuring impressive results for all parties involved.
brands.brands-that-are-with-us: The brands that are with us
brands.second-description: We're proud to work with a variety of renowned brands who trust Social Sync for their advertising campaigns. These partnerships demonstrate our commitment to excellence and innovation in digital marketing.

Premium.description: Enhance your experience with exclusive creator tools with Social Sync Premium.
